unnormalised: Please ensure all RSVPs are submitted by 5 PM on 20/07/2024 to facilitate arrangements for the event scheduled on 27th July, 2024 at 10:00 AM. Confirmation will be sent out by 22/07/2024.
normalised: Please ensure all R-S-V-Ps are submitted by five P-M on twentieth July two thousand and twenty four to facilitate arrangements for the event scheduled on twenty seventh July, two thousand and twenty four at ten A-M. Confirmation will be sent out by twenty second July two thousand and twenty four.
